DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_CONNECTED.description: The notification the user sees when authetnicated with the devices server

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_ERROR.description: The error notification the user sees with the error for the websocket server

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_DISCONNECT.message: Deconectat de la serverul de dispozitive
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_DISCONNECT.description: The notification the user sees when disconnected from the devices server

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET_TI.description: The title of the question dialog the user sees when there is another connection with his id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET.message: Mai exista o instanta de Studio activa si puteti folosi doar o instanta la un moment dat. Dotiti sa folositi Studio aici?
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET.description: The question dialog text the user sees when there is another instance connected with his id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME_N.message: Va rog dati un nume pentru dispozitivul nou
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME_N.description: The message the user receives when he did not eneter a valid name for a new device

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_TITLE.description: The title of the dialog with instructions on how to add a new device

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME.description: The name of the device with instructions on how to add a new device

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SET_USER_ID.description: The menu item where the user changes the session id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SET_USER_ID_TITLE.description: The dialog title where the user changes the session id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SET_USER_ID_TEXT.message: ID unic folosit pentru conectarea la dispozitive, este similar cu o parola.
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SET_USER_ID_TEXT.description: The text dispalyed in the dialog where the user changes the session id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SET_USER_ID_NO_UU.message: ID-ul sesiunii trebuie sa fie un UUID valid.
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SET_USER_ID_NO_UU.description: The error the user is shown when the enetered session id is not a valid

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_MORE_INFO.description: The button the user clicks to get more information about how to connect a device through the web
